text:
Happy Friday everyone!
Question, I’m looking for make the Simple Menu (HubSpot Native Featured) background transparent…anyone have some tip for it?
When I use it on my template is generating a white box, but I have a color background on my module group…thankss
hi you could change the color to use a RGB and add transparency to it. background-color: rgb(201, 76, 76,.6); the .6 will make it semi-transparent.
Bonjour tt le monde. J'aimerais intégrer HubSpot sur un site développé avec Angular et Spring boot.
Toute solution sera bienvenue. Merci d'avance
Hi Pablo, thank you for your feedback..Yes I tried do it…but is not working at all
But not sure if I applying the info on the right place
You can do this w the v3 api no problem. Build your own form however you want and then shoot the data to HubSpot.
Is there a way to search blogs by blog title(not page title) using HubSpot search input box?
I tried to customize HubSpot default search result module to search blogs by title only. But currently it's finding blogs by page title not blog title
Any idea <@U7SL518D6>? Hope to get your help :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi <@UV0H98LBB>
Could you please share a link to your page with Simple Menu on it?
